label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for synchronizing DNS records with a Pi-Hole Local DNS instance.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added Civo DNS as a new provider for external-dns.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Restored support for exclusion-only domain filters for the AWS provider.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed an issue where DNS records for VirtualServices were not deleted when an error occurred.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug to support conversion between simple and other routing policies for the AWS provider.

label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/medium
notes.text: Updated the ingress-nginx installation guide for Azure Private DNS.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Removed the deprecated hmac-md5 TSIG algorithm from the supported list in the RFC2136 provider.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added ability to customize the service account labels.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added secretConfiguration.subPath to mount specific files from secrets.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Allowed AWS Route53 routing policy changes between simple and other policies.
